mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS GRID_ID , SEQ , TITLE , NOTICE , S_DATE , E_DATE , PUBLISH_YN , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_DATE , CREATOR , CREATED_DATE FROM USER_NOTICE WHERE 1=1

SELECT TITLE , NOTICE FROM USER_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND PUBLISH_YN = 'Y' AND date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN date_format(S_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AND date_format(E_DATE, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND PUBLISH_YN = 'Y' AND date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN date_format(S_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AND date_format(E_DATE, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
